英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for Tourist Hotel and Hotel Rating Assessment by the Tourism Administration, Ministry of Transportation and Communications
中文法規名稱: 交通部觀光署辦理觀光旅館及旅館等級評鑑收費標準
沿革內容:
1. Promulgated on March 2, 2009
2. Amended on August 3, 2012
3. Amended on June 23, 2022
4. Amended on May 2, 2024

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are prescribed pursuant to the provisions of Article 10, Paragraph 1 of the Charges and Fees Act.

When the Tourism Administration, Ministry of Transportation and Communications (“the Tourism Administration”) conducts rating assessments of tourist hotels and hotels, it shall charge rating assessment fees for the items of assessment according to the following schedule:
1.One-star to three-stars rating assessment fees, NTD36,000 (thirty-six thousand New Taiwan dollars).
2.Four-stars and above rating assessment fees, NTD86,000 (eighty-six thousand New Taiwan dollars).
For the issuance of a tourist hotel or hotel rating assessment sign, the Tourism Administration shall charge a fee of NTD3,000 (three thousand New Taiwan dollars).
This Schedule shall come into force from the date of promulgation.
